mapper.select: SELECT a.account_id, a.`account_name`, a.`account_phone`, a.account_member_id, a.account_email, a.account_phone, a.account_status, m.member_id AS m_member_id, m.member_name AS m_member_name, m.member_class_name AS m_member_class_name, m.member_sex AS m_member_sex, m.member_grade_number AS m_member_grade_number, m.member_manager_id AS m_member_manager_id, m.member_department_id AS m_member_manager_id, m.member_status AS m_member_status, m.member_role_id AS m_member_role_id, mr.member_role_id AS m_r_member_role_id, mr.member_role_name AS m_r_member_role_name, d.department_id AS m_d_department_id, d.department_name AS m_d_department_name FROM account a LEFT JOIN member m ON m.`member_id` = a.`account_member_id` LEFT JOIN member_roles mr ON mr.`member_role_id` = m.`member_role_id` LEFT JOIN department d ON d.`department_id` = m.`member_department_id` WHERE a.`account_id` = #{memberId}
